Unfortunately the answer is no, there's no built-in facility to retain comments. I think it would be easy with a custom token filter. I will look into adding this feature.
if you can wait for a day or two - I'm preparing update, comment handling will be there. Should be able to upload it by tom (Sunday) night.
Just submitted new version, it's there. ParseTreeNode now has Comments property - a collection of all comment tokens that precede this node
